author: cms-tsg-storm
body:
#### PR description:

Development of HLT menus for `CMSSW_12_2_X`. Includes the integration of the following JIRA tickets:

 - [CMSHLT-2189](https://its.cern.ch/jira/browse/CMSHLT-2189): technical fix for Tracker-DCS info in Run-3
 - [CMSHLT-2194](https://its.cern.ch/jira/browse/CMSHLT-2194): bugfix for parameter `hltHtMhtCaloJetsFiveC25.minNJetHt` (affects 3 triggers in GRun)

#### PR validation:

TSG tests.

#### If this PR is a backport, please specify the original PR and why you need to backport that PR:

N/A
title: HLT menu development for `12_2_X`
